Texture¶

class visii.texture(*args, **kwargs)¶

The “Texture” component describes a 2D pattern used to drive the “Material” component’s parameters.

static create(name)¶

Constructs a Texture with the given name.

Return type

Texture

Returns

a Texture allocated by the renderer.

static create_from_data(name, width, height, data)¶

Constructs a Texture with the given name from custom user data.

Parameters

  • width (int) – The width of the image.

  • height (int) – The height of the image.

  • data (std::vector< glm::vec4,std::allocator< glm::vec4 > >) – A row major flattened vector of RGBA texels.

Return type

Texture

Returns

a Texture allocated by the renderer.

static create_from_image(name, path)¶

Constructs a Texture with the given name from a image located on the filesystem.

Supported formats include JPEG, PNG, TGA, BMP, PSD, GIF, HDR, PIC, and PNM :type path: string :param path: The path to the image. :rtype: Texture :return: a Texture allocated by the renderer.
